backend/main.mo: Defines backend actor with authorization, storage mixins, and data types for referrals, intakes, beds, facilities, access requests, and placement records.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting UI reordering work on ReferralsTab and associated components and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purpose and behavior of various frontend components, hooks, and pages.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Production deployment checklist detailing prerequisites and steps for building and deploying the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining CSS variables for light and dark themes and applying base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint loading the React app via main.tsx with a root div.
frontend/SMOKE_TESTS.md: Smoke test procedure describing manual verification steps for login, admin access, and UI health in production.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication, role-based routing, public referral route, and initial profile/admin checks.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: UI screen for users awaiting access approval with logout option and informational guidance.
frontend/src/components/AccessRequestsTa: Displays pending access requests, allowing admins to approve them by assigning a principal or delete them.
frontend/src/components/ActivityLogTab.t: Fetches and paginates activity log entries, formatting actions, entities, and user names for display in a table.
frontend/src/components/AdminBedUtilizat: Shows total, available, and occupied beds, including per-program breakdowns.
frontend/src/components/AdminRiskOvervie: Provides a compact admin dashboard summarizing at‑risk referrals, intakes, and beds with quick navigation.
frontend/src/components/AdminStatusCheck: Displays admin status info, including caller principal, admin flag, and full admin principal list with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/BedsTab.tsx: Renders bed management UI with filtering, assignment, editing, and admin-only persistence of preferences; triggers bed mutations only on explicit user actions.
frontend/src/components/DashboardOvervie: Displays referral, intake, and bed statistics with loading skeletons and status badges, optionally including admin bed utilization data.
frontend/src/components/EmploymentTab.ts: Empty placeholder file with no implemented UI or logic.
frontend/src/components/FacilitiesTab.ts: Provides facility creation and bed addition interfaces with validation, capacity checks, and explicit user-triggered mutations.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying branding and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header showing app branding, theme toggle, user info dropdown, and logout handling with identity and cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/IntakesDataViewT: Renders sortable intake table with status, program, bed assignment, and risk indicators, fetching intakes, beds, and users.
frontend/src/components/IntakesTab.tsx: Manages intake creation, review, bed assignment, exit processing, internal notes, and case manager assignment with multiple dialogs and data views.
frontend/src/components/PartnerAgencyPro: Displays and edits the partner agency’s profile with validation and save functionality.
frontend/src/components/PartnerReferrals: Handles listing, creating, editing, resubmitting, and document uploading for partner agency referrals.
frontend/src/components/PlacementEmploym: Allows staff to view and update client employment placement and weekly check-in data.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for new users to submit basic profile info for admin approval.
frontend/src/components/ReferralCountsSu: Computes and displays referral status counts in a compact summary card.
frontend/src/components/ReferralsTab.tsx: Main referrals management UI with filtering, sorting, status updates, history viewing, and review actions.
frontend/src/components/ReferralStatusBa: Displays a status badge for a referral with an icon, label, and style variant based on status.
frontend/src/components/RequestAccessFor: Form for users to submit an access request and shows a confirmation screen after submission.
frontend/src/components/StaffMyWorkTab.t: Shows intakes and referrals assigned to the logged‑in staff member, sorted by recent activity.
frontend/src/components/StaffOverviewCom: Provides a compact dashboard of referral, intake, and bed statuses, including at‑risk counts and quick navigation.
frontend/src/components/StatusHistoryTim: Renders a chronological timeline of status history entries for referrals or intakes with timestamps and user info.
frontend/src/components/TrainingTab.tsx: Renders a training management interface letting staff load a client's training record, edit status, track, checklists, and notes, and save updates through backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/UserManagementTa: Displays all users, separates pending and active users, and allows assigning roles through backend mutations with visual badges.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and maintains a backend actor tied to the authenticated identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication via Internet Identity, exposing identity state, login, logout, and status, and initializes AuthClient with customized behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useNow.ts: Returns a timestamp that updates every minute to support UI time refreshes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines many React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for user, admin, partner agency, training, and other data operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes and global UI styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Renders an admin dashboard with tabbed navigation for oversight of referrals, intakes, beds, facilities, access requests, users, and activity logs.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Provides login via Internet Identity and an option to request access, with a branded card-based UI.
frontend/src/pages/PartnerDashboard.tsx: Displays a partner dashboard with tabs for viewing referrals, submitting new ones, and managing agency profile.
frontend/src/pages/PublicReferralPage.ts: Implements a public referral submission form with validation, checkbox confirmation, API submission, and success handling.
frontend/src/pages/StaffDashboard.tsx: Shows a staff dashboard with tabs for overview, work items, referrals, intakes, beds, training, and placement.
frontend/src/utils/atRisk.ts: Contains utility functions to detect at‑risk referrals, intakes, and beds based on timestamps and assignment state.
frontend/src/utils/bedTrackingPreference: Handles loading, validating, saving, and clearing bed‑tracking user preferences in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/referralFilters.ts: Provides utility functions to build program filter options and filter referrals by program, status, and date range.
frontend/src/utils/referralSort.ts: Sorts referrals by status or submission date with deterministic tie-breakers using creation time and ID.
frontend/src/utils/referralValidation.ts: Validates referral form fields and generates error messages, plus helpers to check and interpret validation errors.
frontend/src/utils/referralWaitingTime.t: Calculates elapsed time since referral creation and formats waiting-time strings, including an overdue check.
frontend/src/utils/sortByUpdatedAt.ts: Sorts items by updatedAt descending with ID tie-breakers, with helpers for referrals and intakes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/utils/userDisplay.ts: Resolves a principal to a display name, falling back to a shortened principal or 'System'.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, animations, container settings, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Describes the project's current architecture, features, and known issues for Neighbors Light.
